document.full_text: the nfl was left facing an uncertain future after being plunged into its first work stoppage for almost a quarter of a century at midnight on friday, when team owners imposed a lockout on their players.
document.title: owners impose lockout on players after talks fail: report
lines_and_colors: the nfl was left facing an uncertain future after being plunged into its first work stoppage for almost a quarter of a century at midnight on friday, when team owners imposed a lockout on their players.
